doc:
Alan Davies https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alan_Davies 0 Alan Roger Davies ( "Davis"; born 6 March 1966) is an English stand-up comedian, writer and actor. He has played the title role in the BBC mystery drama series Jonathan Creek since 1997, and has been the only permanent panellist on the BBC panel show QI since 2003. Alan_Roger_Davies ( "_Davis " ; born 6_March_1966 ) is an_English_stand-up_comedian_,_writer_and_actor . He has_played the_title_role in the_BBC_mystery_drama_series_Jonathan_Creek since 1997 , and has_been the_only_permanent_panellist on the_BBC_panel_show QI since 2003 .
